summary: A young woman finds her already unstable life rocked by the presence of a rambunctious imaginary friend from childhood.
cast: Phoebe Cates|Rik Mayall|Marsha Mason|Tim Matheson|Carrie Fisher|Keith Charles|Ashley Peldon|Daniel Gerroll|Ron Eldard|Eleanor Mondale|Bob Reid|Peter Thoemke|Sjoukje De Jong Douma|Paul Holmes|Steve Cochran|Robert Meyzen|Daniel Buchen|Marie Mathay|Peter Breitmayer|Clark Niederjohn|Tom Bethke|Elizabeth Gray|Cheryl Hawker|Michael Welker|Kelly Benson|Cathy Lind Hayes|David John Adamson|Kevin Deon|Bridget Fonda|Rod Pitman|Andrei Sterling
keywords: imaginary friend|emotional manipulation|bedtime story|domineering mother|adulterous husband
director: Director: Ate de Jong (as Ate De Jong)
title: Fred
